revised_title: John Hammond: A Pioneering Figure in Animal Production and Meat Research
tldr: John Hammond was a pioneering figure in animal production and meat research. His work focused on the study of animal reproduction, growth, and carcase composition. He played a significant role in the development of artificial insemination techniques and contributed to the establishment of meat research institutes. Hammond's research had a profound impact on British animal production and influenced livestock policies worldwide.
